Rowdy Wolf:





Rowdy Wolf suddenly stopped his music playing, feeling a presence near-by. 
Within two seconds, he put away his flute and withdrew his rifle. He spun 
around to whatever it was and aimed his weapon, his fur flying with his 
movement. He stopped himself from pulling the trigger, seeing that what 
disturbed him was an arctic wolf. He stared at it, sitting, watching him.
He watched it as it watched him. After a few moments, he threw his arms up, 
fur flying like fringes, calling out: "Shoo!"
